div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene vltimo die mensis' maij anno
quo supra

The saide day margaret of Kintor the relict of vmquhile Androw branche
with patry rede hir forspekar schew how that gilbert menyeis
and Johne of Retre was bundin for the barnispart of gudis pertening
to Johne branche hir' sone quhilkis gilbert and Jonhe Retre scho
offerit hir to freithe and releiwe Ande to pay and deliuer the saidez
barnispart of gudis to the saide Johne branche for the Releving
and frethin of the saide Souerte and Caucounis

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod Johannes
branche est legittime etatis ad recipiendum bona sua ac ad constituendum
procuratores pro receptione eorundem

Eodem die Johannes branche fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
et ordinauit matheum branche suum fratrem suum verum legittimum
et Indubitatum procuratorem ad petendum exigendum et Recipiendum
a margareta Kintor matre sua omnia et singula bona sibi Racione decessus
patris suj pertinenciis Et de Receptis acquitandum agendum defendendum
prosequendum calumpniandum promittens se Ratum et gratum et cetera in vberiore
forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis Et
dictus matheus obligauit se deliberare bona recipere contingit eidem
Johannem qui requisitus fuerit per eundem Johannem Et commodum eorundem
ad visum ipsius Johannis

Eodem die Alexander prat fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem mydiltone et cristinum prat
coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores actores factores ad prosequendum Willelmum Kintor pro
xl s' sibi debito de terra quam Occupat et in aliis actionibus ipsum continens petendum
exigendum et recipiendum de receptis acquitandum Agendum defendendum et cetera promittens de Rato et
grato Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et Oportunis

Eodem die Johannes malisone fecit constituit creauit et Nominauit Johannem ramsay
suum legittimum procuratorem dans et concedens eidem suam libram potestatem ad petendum exigendum
et recipiendum suos annuos Redditus et firmas sibi debito et de receptis acquitandum
at in aliis caus' ipsum concernens promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma
procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis necesseriis

Eodem die Johannes mar' fecit constituit et ordinauit patricium leslie suum legittimum procuratorem
ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum summam decim li' monete scocie sibi debito et
sibi Johannem fechat

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vijo die mensis
Junij anno quo supra

Johannes Cullane Andreas Cullane thomas Waus matheus branche
Johanes Kintor Dauid blinsele thomas Watsone Robertus crag patricius
rede gilbertus litstar' Willelmus nicholsone Willelmus Kintor Jacobus Kennerty Andreas
meldrum et Johannes Arthour' burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes
Duncansone frater mariote Duncansone latricis presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus
ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domino nostri regis de quadam terra Interiore Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico inferiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terras Johannis achnewe
ex orientali et boreali partibus et terram georgei bisset ex occidentali et montem sancte Katherine
virginis versus austrum Et de quadam terra Interiore et anteriore Cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico
superiori ecclesiam ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis moir' ex orientali et terram quondam
Willelmi rollande ex occidentali et quam dicta mariota est legittima et propinquior heres dicti quondam
Johannes fratris sui de dictis terris cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terre cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum
xl s' et valuerunt xx s' tempore pacis Et quod in Capite de suppremo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod dicta terra Interior inter existit
in manibus domini nostri Regis per spacium dimidij annj ob decessum quondam dictis Johannis fratris suj
In defectu virj heredis Jus suum huiuscumque minime prosequentis Et quod dicta terra Interiore
et anteriore nunc existit in manibus Katherine Cullan sponsa quondam dictis Johannis racione
coniuncte Infeodacionis pro toto tempore vite sue datis et clausulis sub sigillo
vnius balliuorum dicti burgi ac sigillo quorundam quj hinc Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno
die mense et loco prenotatis

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday that next cumis
to the Relict of Williame goldsmitht tile ansuer' to the bill of airschipe
gevin be Sandy goldsmytht hir' sone and to deliuer the saide gudis samekle'
as he cane preiwe has fadir hed' and was possessit witht

The saide day Johne fechat grauntit to pay Johne Alexander andirsone for his clatht
within viij dais or ellis to tyne the x s' of Arlis gevin apone the saide
clatht

The saide day the borghe' fundin be sere Alex Androw Colysone one Symon
ellone that he hede nocht deliuerit to him the key of his butht and the male
of the samyn in dew tyme was fundin availe for the quhilkis the saide
Symon' was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera be ane suorne assis' Johne of
Cullane forspekar'

The saide day Jonhne Waus studente of the vniuersite of Abirdene producit ane
chartir vndir the Sele of patry gordone of methtlik maid' to him of ane
annuele Rent of xxtj li' in the yer' et cetera and ane lettir of Sesin tharapon' and ane Instrument
of Sesin and ane obligacion' vndir the said' patrikis Sele et cetera asking the
samyn to be transsumit et cetera

Cura balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
Junij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit and chargit Agnes badenaghe'
the relict of vmquhile Williame goldsmytht to deliuere tile Alexander goldsmytht
hir sone the gudis of airschipe quhilkis scho grantit in Jugement befor
thame pertening to him be deces' of his said' fadir quhome gold gode assolye
In continent but delay And' atour with consent of batht the saide partiis thai assignit
to the saide Alexander to preiwe the gudis of airschip clamit be him and denyit be
his said' modir one friday that next cumis befor thame contenit in ane bile
gevin tharpone as in the samyne at mair lintht is contenit Ande In likuis' thai
assignit to the saide Alexander Agnes tile preiwe the somes of money clamyt be hir
aving be the saide Alexander fir sone to hir the saide friday eftir the tenor of
hir bill producit in the Contre as the samyn mair fullely proportis

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit Johne rede hatmakar becaus' he was
worthiast of his craft tile cers' and see the stuff and hattis of his craft and
quhar' he findis ony vnsufficient Stuf to present the falt to thame that it may
be pvnist according to Justice

Eodem die thomas Wricht alias coule conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
mathei branche prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio margarete gardinar Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt et dicta margareta conuicta de omni perturbio dicti thome / Insuper dictus thomas
conuictus fuit per prefatam assisam pro perturbio Agnetis prat ex ore dictum prelocutoris Cuj emen
dabit ut Jura volunt et dicta Agnes conuicta de perturbio dicte thome Insuper
diliberatus fuit per prelibatam assisam quod dictus thomas genubus flexis petet veniam
a dictis mulieribus ac Restituiet vnum par le cardis dicte margarete ac soluet
dimidium libre cere ad lumen sancti Sanguinis et si in postrum perturbauerit dictas
mulieres aut antequam eorundem seu quemcumque alium soluet fabrice ecclesie xxtj
s' sine remissione non obstanti dictis partibus presentis Obligatis ad standum
et subendum' diliberacionj per manuum suarum ostendem sub media

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo die
Junij anno quo supra

the saide day Williame scrimgeor Officiar' at commavnde of the balyeis chargit
androw nachtj to remane within the tolbutht quhile he content and pait sere Androw
Colisone tene s' or fynd' him souerte for the pament of the samyn becaus'
thai ordanit him to tak sufficient Souerte of Androw glenny cordonar for the said'
Some

The saide day Comperit Johne andirsone and offerit him reddy tile ansuer'
to Johne fechat in ale thingis he hade to say tile J him and becaus' the
saide Johne nor nayne vthir in his nayme comperit to follow him he
protestit for his costis skathtis and expensis or euere he be herde in Jugement
in contrar' him and to be quyt of his challance quhile he be new follouit and
lauchfullie warnit

The said day William colp come souerte to the bailyes that William Rolland salbe
skaithles' of the Countour pertenyng to the ayr of vmquhill William buchane

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die mensis
Junij Anno quo supra

The said day the alderman and bailyeis assignit this day aucht dais to Jhonn'
fechat tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Jhonne' horne for the wranguis'
withhalding fra him of xxxvj s' vj d'

Eodem die thomas brovne pistor conuictus fuit per Juratam assisam ex ore Dauid
mar' prelocutoris pro perturbio Alexandri skippertj Cui emendabit vt Jura volunt

Eodem die thomas brovne conuictus fuit per dictam assisam ex ore Dauid mar
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio curie et emendabit vt Jura volunt

The said day the balyes chargit William scrimgeour officiar to put Androw nauchtj in
the tolbutht' ande lok the dur' one him becaus' he was chargit obefor' to reman'
within the tolbutht quhill he pait x s' to ser Androw collisoun' for Androw glenny
cordoner And passit furth of the tolbuth' but leif of the bailyes and the said'
x s' vnpait et cetera

The said day the alderman ande bailyes assignit this day aucht dais to Jhonne Ar
thour to ansuer peremptourly to the borghe' fundin one him be Androw cullan that
he awe to mak rede and pament of the rest of quarter of certan' wynis and' salt cardis
botht betuix alexander rede James collisone the saides Androw ande Jhonne fra Richerde ande
nicholes' frenchmen' And for the wranguis' stoping and halding fra the said Androw of
his part of the siluer of the wyne sellit be Dauy Ruthirfurde et cetera

The said day gilbert litstar producit this acquitance in Jugment eftir follouinge
I Duncane collisone burges of Aberdene grantis me weill content and pait of
ale merchandice and coimpt and Reknyng betuix me and my Eme' gilbert litstar
burges of the said burghe' to this day ande quietclamys the said gilbert nowe
and foreuere In witnes of the quhilkis thing I the said Duncane has writin this
present acquitance with my avin hand' At Abirdene the xvij day of Junij the
yer' of gode ane thousand fiwe hundreth and four yeris Duncane collisone
manu propria

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pertorio eiusdem xxviijo die mensis
Junij Anno quo supra

The said day Jhonne fechat lauchfully callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe fundin one him be Jhone horne for w the wranguis' haldin
fra him of xxxvj s' and vj d' tharfor the bailyes ordanit William scrimgeour
to pas' and tak ane stras' of the said Jhone and lat it agane to borghe' gif
it be askit Ande warne him to monunday the first day of Julij to ansuer
to the said borghe' as secund day of process'

The said day thomas Robertson requirit and prait mastir William strachin
to deliuer and gif to James collisone and ser Jhonne stirueling ale charteris
ande euidentis pertenyng to the landis and annuell rentis bocht be thame
fra him and Jonet strachin his wif And dischargis and quietclamys
the said mastir William his ayris executoris and assignez for him ande
the said Jonet thar ayris executoris and assignez now and for euere

The said day it was fundin that thomas Robertsone was awande
tile wmquhile Waltter strachin xxxiiij s' quhilkis Androw nauchtj at
command of the bailyeis chargit him to p fynd souerte and to pay the said
Sovme within terme of law

The saide day Androw Cullane follouit the borghe' fundyne be him one Johne arthour
for the wranguis withhaldin fra him of Certane hidis extending to the Some of
xxix cronis Scottis money or tharby of the rest of ane quartar' of Certane wynez'
and cardis bocht fra Nicholes and richerd' franchmen be alexander Rede James Colisone
him and the saide Johne that he aw to recompens' and pay for the saide xxix cronis'
of the rest of his part of the saide merchandice et cetera quhilkis borghe' the saide Johne
Arthour' denyit Ande in continent the saide borghe was put to the decisione of
ane Suorne assis' quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis resonis' and allegacionis
of batht the saide partiis herde and vndirstandin deliuerit be the moutht of Robert
blinsele forspekar of the said assis' that thai coude nocht deliuere Anent the
said' borghe' for thar was nay witnesing producit befor thame bot the
allegeance of the said' partiis tharfor thai continevit the decisioune of the
said' borghe' quhile eftir michaelmes nixt to Cum quhile the Agane Cumin
of the said' nicholes and Richerde franchmen' but preiudice of ony party
that thai mycht declar' the verite in the said' matir

The saide day Androw Cullan disassentit to the continuacioun' of the saide borghe'
Requiring the aldirman and ballieis for ministracioun of Justice Allegeande
that the saide borghe' sulde haue be decidit and protestit for Remede of
law and tharof tuk Instrument of me sere Johne Stirueling clerk and notar
Acta in pretorio dicti burgi hoc xijma in meredie testibus Alexandro Rede alexandro chamer
Jacobo Colisone Johanne talyour thoma Robertsone Willelmo scrimgeor et Andrea nachtj
seriandis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis
Julij Anno quo supra et cetera

head.add: males' the wif of Alexander gray et cetera

div.p:
The said day meg males' was conuict be ane suorne assis' patry red forspekar
for the strubulance of the wif of Alexander gray for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament
of the court And to amend as law will and forbeir in tyme to cum

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis Julij Anno quo supra

add.foreign: Alexander red et alexander gray magister fabrice ecclesie

div.p:
The said day Alexander gray mastir of the kirk werk grantit that he hede
ressauit fra Alexander rede his maile of his half nethis fisching of Done'
of the termes of mertimes in winter and witsonday Inmediate gangand befor
the daie of this act' And ane barrell of Salmond' promittit to sanct ni
choles' werk

The said day thomas hay was fundin nerest ande lauchfull ayr
tile vmquhill Elene murisoun' his modir be ane Inquest of the court

The said day Jonet hay was conuict be ane suorne assis' ser Jhonne
Ruthirfurd' forspekar for the strubulance of Duncan collisone and for
the quhilkis sche was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera Alsua the said
assis' ordanit and deliuerit that gif euere the saide Jonet happinis to
tribill the said Duncane or ony nichtbour of this tovne and beis conuikit tharof
sche salbe banyst ande expellit this tovne

The saide day Johnhe arthour grantit that he was ane that consentit to by the
fiwe puncionis of wyne and xliiijor dusane and ix par' of cardis fra Richerde
franchman and to tak his part of the saide merchandice and to pay his part
for the samyn as his nychtbouris pais that bocht the samyn

The saide day Johne Arthour was quyt of the bying of Nicholes
the franchismannis wynis follouit be Androw Cullane to haue bene ane
partiner of the bying of the samyn for it was referrit to the saide Johnnez
aithe be the saide Androw and he deponit he bocht nay part of the saide Nicho
les wyne bot gif he walde haue resauit his penny worthis and Dauy
ruthirfurdis quhilk thai schew him obefor

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem viijo
die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that nixt Cumis to thome
hay to preiwe the brew caldrone follouit and clamyt be him fra
Williame smitht ayrschip to him and being in his modir possession'
in tyme of hir' decess' and to prewe ale vthir gudis of airschipe
clamyt be him and denyit be the saide Williame and his wif

The saide day Williame smytht and his wif tuk to preiwe one friday that
next Cumis befor the balyes that the caldrone clamyt be thome hay
in airschip to him was gevin to hir' be vmquhile Ellene mvresone
hir' modir in the merchand' butht quhene it was tvcht

The saide day the borghe fundin one Williame stile be William Skene the
wranguis' taking of ane hors fra him out of the cart was fundin of nayne
availe be ane Suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar for the quhilkis the saide
Williame Skene was in ane Amerciament of the court and the saide William Stile
quyt of this challance
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day Donalde michelsone clamyt ane hors' one the behalf of sere findlaw
fergus Donald fergousone chaplan of newthmoir' being in the handis of Dauy murray
quhilkis allegit he hede borghe' and hamwalde to warande him the saide hors'
and askit ane lauchfule day to bring his warande becaus' he was in the kingis seruice
with my lorde of huntlie loutennent Ande the prouest and ballieis riplie avisit
assignit monunday eftir the fest of Sanct michaele next hereftir folloing
the hed' court day of the saide burghe' to the said' Dauy to bring his wa
rrande and the saide hors' gif he beis of liwe Ande gif the saide hors' beis
one cais' deid' he sal bring the price of him that he was prisit the said'
day be suorne prisaris in presence of the said' partiis tile xxx s' Ande
Williame murray come Souerte be his hande for the saide Dauy for the
entiring of the saide hors' and warande as said' Is Ande thomas Waus
Come Souerte for the said' Donalde that he or ane procuratour of the saide
sere gilbertis findelawis sale cum the saide day and follow the saide hors'

The saide day Donalde michelsone Solemptlie protestit for his costis
skathis dampnis and expensis made and to be maid' in the perseving
and wanting of the saide hors' In the nayme and behalf of sere Donalde
findelaw ferguson' chaplane of newthmoir' his mastir
